short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Dark mode for coders by Braidata

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing 'Braidata Dark Mode' by Braidata, a Chrome extension that brings soothing comfort to your programming experience. Designed with coders in mind, this extension effortlessly shifts your coding environment into a darker theme to reduce strain on your eyes and increase focus during late-night sessions or long hours of coding.

Whether you're a novice learning your first language or a seasoned developer diving into complex codes, this extension is a must-have tool to simplify your coding journey. Discover the potential of coding in comfort with 'Braidata Dark Mode' by Braidata.
